title: Verify: Custom Header - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP on a mobile device in portrait mode
custom_steps: When the user scrolls down the VTP page
custom_expected:
Then the use should see a 640x100 retina(320x50 display) mobile web header which is pinned to the top of index with the playlist content scrolling below. 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/830)

title: Verify: Customer Header - LANDSCAPE
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP on a mobile device in landscape mode
custom_steps: When the user scrolls down the VTP page
custom_expected: Then the use should see a 640x100 retina(320x50 display) mobile web header which is pinned to the top of index with the playlist content scrolling below.

title: Verify: First Ad displays between 3-4 clips
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP on a mobile device
custom_steps: When the user scrolls through the video clips on the VTP page
custom_expected:
Then the user should see a 320x50 Ad which displays between the first 3-4 clips.  
![](index.php?/attachments/get/831)

title: Verify: Additional ads appear after every 6th clips
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP on a mobile device
custom_steps: When the user scrolls pass the first 320x50 Ad Banner
custom_expected: Then any additional 320x250 Ad Banners should appear after every 6th video clips

title: Verify: Standart Component - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device
custom_steps: When the Standard Component VTP page is present
custom_expected:
Then the user should see a custom open button to the right of the video/metadata
![](index.php?/attachments/get/809)

title: Verify: Standard Component - Open drawer - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device
custom_steps:
When the Standard Component VTP page is present
And the user taps the Custom component open button
custom_expected:
Then the Right column components slides open and pushes video/metadata content to the left. The component contains a 300x100 Ad Unit and 300x360 standard component.
 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/810)

title: Verify: Standard Component - Collapse drawer - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device
custom_steps:
When the Standard Component VTP page is present
And the user taps the Custom component open button
*Drawer is open
custom_expected:
Then the right column components slides closed and pushes video/metadata content to the right.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/812)

title: Verify: Standard Component - rotate to landscape w/ Collapsed drawer - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device
custom_steps:
When the Standard Component VTP page is present
AND the user rotates the device into landscape mode
![](index.php?/attachments/get/814)
custom_expected:
Then the video/metadata appears with the 300x100 Ad unit and 300x360 Standard component to the right of the player 
 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/813)

title: Verify: Standard Component - rotate to landscape w/ Open drawer - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device in portrait mode
![](index.php?/attachments/get/816)
custom_steps:
When the Standard Component VTP page is present
And the user taps the Custom component open button
And the user rotates the device to landscape mode
![](index.php?/attachments/get/817)
custom_expected:
Then the Right column components appears to the right of the video/metadata content. The component contains a 300x100 Ad Unit and 300x360 standard component.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/815)

title: Verify: Standard Component - rotate to portrait - LANDSCAPE
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device in landscape mode
custom_steps:
When the Standard Component VTP page is present
And the user rotates the device into portrait mode
![](index.php?/attachments/get/819)
custom_expected:
Then the video/metadata appears with the collapsed drawer
![](index.php?/attachments/get/820)

title: Verify: Standard Component w/ Custom Header - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device in portrait mode
custom_steps: When the Standard Component w/ Customer Header VTP page is present
custom_expected:
Then the user should see a 768x90 customer header above the video/metadata 
AND a custom open button to the right of the video/metadata 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/821)

title: Verify: Standard Component w/ Custom Header - rotate to landscape w/ Collapsed drawer - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device in portrait mode.
custom_steps:
When the Standard Component w/ Custom Header is present
AND the user rotates the device into landscape mode
![](index.php?/attachments/get/822)
custom_expected:
Then the 970x90 customer header appears above the video/metadata 
AND the right column component appears to the right of the video/metadata content. The component contains a 300x100 Ad Unit and 300x360 standard component.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/823)

title: Verify: Standard Component w/ Custom Header - rotate to landscape w/ Open drawer - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device in portrait mode
custom_steps:
When the Standard Component w/ customer header VTP page is present
And the user taps the Custom component open button
And the user rotates the device to landscape mode.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/824)
custom_expected:
Then the 970x90 custom header appears above the video/metadata 
And the right column components appears to the right of the video/metadata content. 
*The component contains a 300x100 Ad Unit and 300x360 standard component.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/825)

title: Verify: Standard Component w/ Custom Header - Open drawer - PORTRAIT
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the Custom VTP page on a tablet device in portrait mode
custom_steps:

![](index.php?/attachments/get/827)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/826)
